mapper.insert: insert into t_application (owner_nm, owner_email, owner_contact , rstrnt_nm, city_pk, more_info) values (#{owner_nm}, #{owner_email}, #{owner_contact} , #{rstrnt_nm}, #{city_pk}, #{more_info})
mapper.select: select A.*, B.nm as city_nm from t_application A inner join t_city B on A.city_pk = B.pk order by pk desc
select A.*, B.nm as city_nm from t_application A inner join t_city B on A.city_pk = B.pk where process_status = #{process_status} order by pk desc
select A.*, B.nm as city_nm from t_application A inner join t_city B on A.city_pk = B.pk where A.pk = #{pk}
mapper.insert: insert into t_rstrnt (owner_pk, nm, city_pk) select B.pk as owner_pk, A.rstrnt_nm as nm, A.city_pk from t_application A inner join t_owner B on A.owner_email = B.email where A.owner_email = #{owner_email}
